lahongvan.name: La Hồng Vân
lahongvan.title: Deputy General Director
lahongvan.about: Marketing professional with 10+ years of experience in digital strategy and brand development for international markets.

company.name: VNFT GROUP
company.description: VNFT Group, reformed from VN forwarding and trading company LTD, is a one of the leading Logistics company in Vietnam who have many experience years in forwarder & Logistics management, project cargo and Breakbulk cargo handling. VNFT Group has large relationship with many carriers and airlines, ownership.
company.address: 3rd Floor DMA Building, 45 Dinh Tien Hoang, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam
